headline: Altria vs. Philip Morris: Which Is the Smarter Play for Now?
summary: MO and PM advance their smoke-free strategies as each leverages pricing, innovation and cost discipline in a shifting tobacco market.

headline: Argus Raises Philip Morris (PM) Outlook on Rising Contribution from Nicotine Pouches
summary: Philip Morris International Inc. (NYSE:PM) is included among the 13 Best Long-Term Dividend Stocks to Invest in Right Now. On February 26, Argus raised its price recommendation on Philip Morris International Inc. (NYSE:PM) to $210 from $190. It reiterated a Buy rating on the stock. The firm said the company’s ZYN nicotine pouches are expected […]

headline: PHILIP MORRIS INTERNATIONAL (NYSE:PM) Shows Strong Technical and Setup Ratings Ahead of Potential Breakout
